articles.description: The Nationals have activated Aníbal Sánchez from the 60-day injured list, setting him up to start tonight's game against the Braves. …
articles.content: The Nationals have activated Aníbal Sánchez from the 60-day injured list, setting him up to start tonight’s game against the Braves. Reliever Mason Thompson was optioned to Triple-A Rochester to free… [+2369 chars]
